description.displayText: Kim was my back-up care when our nanny went on vacation a few months ago, and she is now our regular sitter.  She is super experienced, knowledgeable, flexible, punctual and energetic.  Kim was amazing at helping us navigate through our 20-month old separation anxiety from day 1, making the process easy and un-stressful for everyone.  I can't imagine a situation that she can't handle and can't say enough positive things about her.  Any family would be lucky to have Kim.

description.displayText: Kim was a huge help in helping me learn how to be a father to my daughter after time apart from her. She was an essential part of M.'s life, but also, a big part of mine as well. She handled a difficult situation with tact, and always put M. ahead of anything else. I cannot endorse her enough.
description.originalText: Kim was a huge help in helping me learn how to be a father to my daughter after time apart from her. She was an essential part of M.'s life, but also, a big part of mine as well. She handled a difficult situation with tact, and always put M. ahead of anything else. I cannot endorse her enough.

description.displayText:
I can't say enough positive things about Kim!

We found Kim after having had a really negative experience with our first nanny, and could not have come into our lives at a more perfect moment.

We have twin boys, and Kim's EXPERTISE in what she does showed from the moment she joined our family.  She understands the balance between kindness/gentleness and discipline, and cared for our boys in the best way I could have imagined.  

She's passionate about the work that she does and professionalism, fun and love emanate from her.  Anyone considering Kim should JUMP at the chance to work with her.  She is a true gem.

description.displayText: Kim is a very honest, kind, caring and hardworking person. She loves taking care of kids, and she would be an excellent caregiver to any child.
description.originalText: Kim is a very honest, kind, caring and hardworking person. She loves taking care of kids, and she would be an excellent caregiver to any child.

description.displayText: She was our daughter's nanny for our two grandchildren for four years.  Her work was above and beyond the call of duty and was an absolutely terrific nanny.
description.originalText: She was our daughter's nanny for our two grandchildren for four years.  Her work was above and beyond the call of duty and was an absolutely terrific nanny.

description.displayText: Kim S. worked for me as a nanny for four years caring for my two children since they were babies. During her time with me, Kim was hard-working, energetic, caring, responsible and always eager to go the extra mile.  Kim was committed to caring for my kids in a way that went above and beyond her duties as a nanny.  She was sincerely invested in their well-being and this shone through in her work.  Kim is an incredible singer and brought music, fun and laughter into the house. However, this was always balanced by a commitment to setting clear boundaries and firm rules. Additionally, Kim was always willing to help with extra things like grocery shopping, picking up necessary things for the kids and cooking.  She will provide a supportive addition to any household.
